name: Geo Big Data Open Platform
description: Operated by the Korea Institute of Geoscience and Mineral Resources (KIGAM), the Geo Big Data Open Platform focuses on managing and preserving national geological data, including research datasets, thematic maps, and reports. It provides integrated search and visualization (2D/3D) of geological thematic maps, and allows users to overlay their own GIS data with large-scale geological maps. The platform also offers information services such as multiplatform geoscience information, marine geological geophysical map data, geoenvironmental information verification, earthquake research information, and more.
owner_name: Korea Institute of Geoscience and Mineral Resources (KIGAM)
